name: Dungeons of Awesome - Quest for the Keys
name_original: Dungeons of Awesome - Quest for the Keys
description:
The doorway to an ancient dungeon is uncovered but 3 magical keys are required to open the lock.  A legendary hero is tasked to acquire the key and open the doorway to The Dungeons of Awesome.

This is the first release of the Dungeons of Awesome Video Game Series and is a work in progress.
